_sText:
de_crossfire_css_v2  a remake of the map  "crossfire"  author  Dario Casali

 tonline_kms65----------20.01.2016-----------Komsomolsk-on-Amur

All the main left just as it was in de_crossfire_css. Those 2 places left Bookmark bombs remained the possibility of a nuclear explosion call button from the bunker.

  • Extras in this version (v2):
    1. Sound map "soundscape" (scripts).
    2. There was a secret room (teleport) where there are HP and AWP + Digl.
    3. Added 3D model of the starry sky with the animation movements of the planets and the sky.

    Map small - better use to DM matches.
    The idea of a secret map room "DM_MARIOKART3_V1" author "Archanor". 
    The test card I did on Counter-Strike: Source v86.
